channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: The teams are hunting for bargains in Newark, with presenter Christina Trevanion and experts Raj Bisram and Roo Irvine. Christina visits the Harley Gallery on the Welbeck Estate to learn about the 5th Duke of Portland, who commissioned a series of eccentric underground building projects there in the 1800s.
